title: Update ClaudeAgent to use stream-json format
description: Update ClaudeAgent.Run() to use stream-json flags: --output-format stream-json --include-partial-messages --verbose. Parse stdout using StreamParser instead of line-by-line text. Return AgentState.ToRecord() as part of Result for persistence.
closed_reason: Updated ClaudeAgent.Run() to use stream-json format with --output-format stream-json --verbose flags. Integrated StreamParser to parse structured JSON output. Added StateCallback to RunOpts for real-time TUI updates and RunRecord to Result for persistence. Removed deprecated parseUsageFromOutput function.
